data.text:
GENERAL CONDITIONS OF USE SYSNAV

Update: 2023/01/10

Any user of the web site healthcare.sysnav.com acknowledges that he/she has read the general conditions of use of the site and undertakes to comply with them.

The Web Site is the sole property of SYSNAV, a French company « Société par Actions Simplifiée » with a share capital of 548.700,00 €, having its registered office at Vernon, France, 72 rue Emile Loubet, 27200, registered at Evreux under number 508 594 009. The publication manager for the web site is David Vissière, as Chief Executive Officer of SYSNAV.

Intellectual Property

The web site including any software, content, trademark, logo, domain name of SYSNAV, texts, drawings, videos, pictures, images whether direct or fixed, sounds, icons and more generally everything appearing on the website are SYSNAV’s exclusive property or the one of its licensors. Any translation, adaptation, transformation, arrangement, reproduction by an art or any type of process as well as any exploitation, total or partial use, copy, representation, reproduction, modification, alteration, downloading, display, transfer or disclosure of all or part of SYSNAV’s website, by any mean whatsoever, are forbidden and considered as illegal pursuant to article L 122-4 of the French Intellectual Property Code and its updates, except if it has been authorized in advance in writing by SYSNAV. This restriction applies also to trademarks and logos of third parties mentioned on SYSNAV’s web site. Any data basis linked to SYSNAV website are also protected by the French Intellectual Property Code. Any representation or total or partial use of these data basis, without SYSNAV express authorization, shall be deemed to be a counterfeiting. Any person infringing these terms shall be liable for the consequences. SYSNAV reserves the right to introduce a claim against any infringing person and/or company.

Exclusion of warranty and liability

Any data or information appearing on SYSNAV’s web site is communicated « as is » with not warranty whatsoever. SYSNAV shall not be held liable for any material and immaterial direct and indirect damages and loss which may result from an access to the web site, its use and/or the use of these information, including any inaccessibility, loss of data, deteriorations, destructions or virus which may affect user’s computer equipment and/or the existence of virus on his/her website. SYSNAV does its best to give access to a reliable content on its web site but does not give any warranty as to the absence of inaccuracies or omissions or as to the unavailability of the information and services. SYSNAV reserves the right to modify the content of its website at any time without prior notice. As a consequence, the user of the website acknowledges and agrees that any use of the information accessible on SYSNAV’s website shall be under its sole responsibility. The web site of third parties which may be used by the user to have access to SYSNAV’s website are not under SYSNAV’s control. Therefore, SYSNAV shall not be responsible for their content nor for the consequences of their use.

Privacy policy and Protection of personal data

Personal data collected during a visit on SYSNAV’s website or by filling up a contact form on such web site shall be dealt with and protected as per SYSNAV’s Privacy policy. The users of SYSNAV website are invited to refer to such policy for any question on personal data.

Applicable law

SYSNAV’s web site, Legal Notice, Privacy Policy and these General Conditions of Use are governed by French Law. Any dispute or litigation in relation to them shall be submitted exclusively to the competent French courts.
